title: Cannot purchase hextech mystery shard
body: I cannot purchase hextech mystery shards with ip. Its been this way for 2 days.

replies.body:
This is a known-issue that we're currently investigating. A recommended workaround is to launch into the Legacy Client from the login screen and make a purchase that way.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if this worked for you.
I figured out the issue was that my IP balence just had a different number then what it was. It's not a big issue for me so I'll just let it stay.
